course_description: Surveys key texts in political philosophy, including ancient, early modern, 19th and 20th century sources. Key issues include the nature of the just state and the rights and responsibilities of citizens.
prerequisites: Any 100 level PHIL or PHIL_OX or equivalent transfer credit course as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1561, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: McAfee/Wiebe, Status: Closed
